author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Senior Citizens Group of Besant Nagar (SCGOBN) book bank at Besant Nagar will distribute free books to the needy students.

A student is eligible for three books if they provide a photocopy of their college ID.

The book bank will be open from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m.

People can also donate books, old and new, to the bank bank.

For details, contact Ph: 9884224480, said a press release.
title: Free books to be distributed
